hero.title: From GitHub to
hero.subtitle: Transform your GitHub projects into professional portfolio sites without coding. Fully customizable solution for developers.

builtOn.title: Built on: Modern technologies you trust

howItWorks.title: How It Works?
howItWorks.subtitle: The easiest way to turn your GitHub projects into a professional portfolio site
howItWorks.step1Desc: Connect your GitHub account with one click. All your public repos are automatically listed.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Choose the projects you want to showcase in your portfolio. README, technologies, and stars are automatically fetched.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Select the template that best fits your style from professional templates. All are mobile-friendly and fast.
howItWorks.step4Desc: Your portfolio is automatically generated and published with your custom domain. You can update it anytime.

templates.title: Professional Templates
templates.subtitle: Choose from modern and mobile-friendly templates for every style
templates.allIncludeDesc: Every template comes with these features

proFeatures.title: PortfolYO+
proFeatures.subtitle: Take your portfolio to the next level with more customization, analytics, and professional tools
proFeatures.customThemeDesc: Customize colors, fonts, spacing, and components as you like. Design without code with visual editor.
proFeatures.customDomainDesc: Professional look with yourname.com. SSL certificate, CDN optimization, and DNS management included.
proFeatures.analyticsDesc: Visitor behavior, traffic sources, conversion rates, and detailed performance metrics.
proFeatures.supportDesc: 24-hour response guarantee, dedicated Slack channel, and 1-on-1 onboarding support.

pricing.devSubtitle: Beta phase - special pricing for early adopters

developer.title: For developers,
developer.subtitle: Designed for developers who have great projects but struggle to showcase them
developer.greetingDesc: I built PortfolYO alone for developers who have great projects but struggle to showcase them. My goal is to remove one of the obstacles at the beginning of your career and accelerate you.
developer.realNeedDesc: Developed from my own portfolio problem
developer.quickSolutionDesc: Create a professional portfolio in 5 minutes

faq.title: Your Questions
faq.subtitle: Short and clear answers. No exaggeration.
faq.a1: Yes. You need to sign in with GitHub to safely pull your projects. This way we can access your repos and automatically create a portfolio.
faq.a2: You can regenerate content anytime. We don't do continuous background synchronization - control is entirely yours.
faq.a3: Currently free. We'll transparently announce future plans. We'll offer early adopter discounts for Pro features.
faq.a4: Control is yours with cookie preferences and GDPR flows. We only process data you allow. GitHub tokens are stored securely.
faq.a5: Yes, after creating, you can update your portfolio again, try different templates, and change content.
faq.a6: If demo mode is on, you can try within minutes with sample data. You can test without a real GitHub account.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.a1: Yes, you can change your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately.
faq.q2: What happens to my existing portfolios if I change plans?
faq.a2: If you downgrade to Hobby plan, 1 portfolYO you selected can remain active.
faq.a3: Yes, we have a 14-day money-back guarantee. Please contact us if you have any issues.
faq.a4: Billing is monthly. The invoice is issued on the same day as the payment date.
